name: The katorga escape
description:
Do you want to escape "the katorga"?

Do you even know what is katorga?

Play this misterious game to know the answer.. and don't forget to avoid stucking in the loop…

Controls:   use arrows to move, "E" to interact.

This project was made as an entry for Ludum Dare # 47. The theme was "Stuck in a loop".  After three days of development, the game is still a bit raw, but I hope you will get some fun playing it!

Thanks for playing! :D
